scripts.clean: rm -rf build dist coverage tsconfig.tsbuildinfo bin
scripts.build-linux: bun run build-fe-linux && bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile bin/x64/linux/psi ./src/index.ts
scripts.build-win: bun run build-fe-win && bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile bin/x64/win/psi.exe ./src/index.ts
scripts.build-mac: bun run build-fe-mac && bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile bin/x64/mac/psi ./src/index.ts
scripts.build-fe-linux: cd ../frontend && cross-env VITE_BASE_URL="" bun run build && rm -f pfe.zip && zip -r pfe.zip dist && cp pfe.zip ../cli/pfe.zip
scripts.build-fe-win: cd ../frontend && cross-env VITE_BASE_URL="" bun run build && tar acvf pfe.zip dist && cp pfe.zip ../cli/pfe.zip
scripts.build-fe-mac: cd ../frontend && cross-env VITE_BASE_URL="" bun run build && tar acvf pfe.zip dist && cp pfe.zip ../cli/pfe.zip
scripts.test-simple-database: rm -rf ./test/db && bun run start -- init ./test/db && bun run start -- add ./test/db ../../test/test.png
